problem_names:
lemma loeb_aux_prv:
assumes \<phi>[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla" "Fvars \<phi> = {}" and p: "prv (\<phi>L \<phi>)"
shows "prv \<phi>"

lemma loeb_aux_bprv:
assumes \<phi>[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla" "Fvars \<phi> = {}" and p: "bprv (\<phi>L \<phi>)"
shows "bprv \<phi>"

theorem loeb_bprv:
assumes \<phi>[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla" "Fvars \<phi> = {}" and p: "bprv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)"
shows "bprv \<phi>"

theorem loeb_prv:
assumes \<phi>[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla" "Fvars \<phi> = {}" and p: "prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)"
shows "prv \<phi>"
translations:
lemma loeb_aux_prv:
assumes \<phi>[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla" "Fvars \<phi> = {}" and p: "prv (\<phi>L \<phi>)"
shows "prv \<phi>"

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  Fvars (\<phi>L \<phi>) = {} \<Longrightarrow>
  bprv (subst P \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle> xx)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)

proof (prove)
using this:
  Fvars (\<phi>L \<phi>) = {} \<Longrightarrow>
  bprv (subst P \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle> xx)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv (subst P \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle> xx)

proof (state)
this:
  bprv (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)

proof (state)
this:
  prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)
  prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)
  prv (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
  ?t \<in> trm \<Longrightarrow> PP ?t \<in> fmla
  \<lbrakk>?\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars ?\<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> \<phi>L ?\<phi> \<in> fmla

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (state)
this:
  prv \<phi>

goal:
No subgoals!

text \<open>Generalization of $\mathit{P\_G}$, the main lemma used for G?del's second:\<close>

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>?\<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars ?\<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (eqv (\<phi>L ?\<phi>)
                          (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L ?\<phi>\<rangle>)
                            ?\<phi>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (imp (\<phi>L \<phi>)
          (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>))

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp (\<phi>L \<phi>)
        (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>imp (\<phi>L \<phi>)
            (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)
           \<in> fmla;
   Fvars
    (imp (\<phi>L \<phi>)
      (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)) =
   {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                     (PP \<langle>imp (\<phi>L \<phi>)
                                   (imp (PP
    \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                                     \<phi>)\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (PP \<langle>imp (\<phi>L \<phi>)
                   (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                     \<phi>)\<rangle>)

proof (state)
this:
  bprv
   (PP \<langle>imp (\<phi>L \<phi>)
                 (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                   \<phi>)\<rangle>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>\<phi>L \<phi> \<in> fmla;
   imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi> \<in> fmla;
   Fvars (\<phi>L \<phi>) = {};
   Fvars (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>) = {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                       (PP \<langle>imp (PP
    \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                                     \<phi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                     \<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  bprv
   (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
     (PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                   \<phi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  Fvars (\<phi>L \<phi>) = {} \<Longrightarrow>
  bprv
   (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
     (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  bprv
   (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
     (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle> \<in> fmla;
   PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>\<rangle>
   \<in> fmla;
   PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>
   \<in> fmla\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                       (cnj (PP \<langle>PP
    \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>)
                         (PP \<langle>imp
 (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>\<rangle>)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (cnj (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>)
         (PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                       \<phi>\<rangle>)))

proof (state)
this:
  bprv
   (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
     (cnj (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                     \<phi>\<rangle>)))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle> \<in> fmla;
   \<phi> \<in> fmla; Fvars (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) = {};
   Fvars \<phi> = {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                     (imp (cnj (PP \<langle>PP
       \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>)
                            (PP \<langle>imp
    (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>\<rangle>))
                       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (cnj (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>)
            (PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                          \<phi>\<rangle>))
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  bprv
   (imp (cnj (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>)
          (PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                        \<phi>\<rangle>))
     (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lbrakk>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle> \<in> fmla;
   cnj (PP \<langle>PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>\<rangle>)
    (PP \<langle>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>\<rangle>)
   \<in> fmla;
   PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle> \<in> fmla\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> bprv
                     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
                       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv
     (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>)
       (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

proof (state)
this:
  bprv
   (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>))

goal:
No subgoals!

text \<open>L?b's theorem generalizes the positive formulation G?del's Second
($\mathit{goedel\_second}$). In our two-provability-relation framework, we get two variants of L?b's theorem.
A stronger variant, assuming @{term prv} and proving @{term bprv}, seems impossible.\<close>

theorem loeb_bprv:
assumes \<phi>[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla" "Fvars \<phi> = {}" and p: "bprv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)"
shows "bprv \<phi>"

proof (state)
this:
  bprv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  bprv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv (\<phi>L \<phi>)

proof (state)
this:
  bprv (\<phi>L \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  bprv (\<phi>L \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  bprv (\<phi>L \<phi>)
  bprv (\<phi>L \<phi>) \<Longrightarrow> bprv \<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. bprv \<phi>

proof (state)
this:
  bprv \<phi>

goal:
No subgoals!

theorem loeb_prv:
assumes \<phi>[simp]: "\<phi> \<in> fmla" "Fvars \<phi> = {}" and p: "prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)"
shows "prv \<phi>"

proof (state)
this:
  \<lbrakk>imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L ?\<phi>1\<rangle>)
            (PP \<langle>?\<phi>1\<rangle>)
           \<in> fmla;
   Fvars
    (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L ?\<phi>1\<rangle>)
      (PP \<langle>?\<phi>1\<rangle>)) =
   {};
   ?\<phi>1 \<in> fmla; Fvars ?\<phi>1 = {}\<rbrakk>
  \<Longrightarrow> prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L ?\<phi>1\<rangle>)
                          (PP \<langle>?\<phi>1\<rangle>))

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (state)
this:
  prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (imp (PP \<langle>\<phi>L \<phi>\<rangle>) \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv (\<phi>L \<phi>)

proof (state)
this:
  prv (\<phi>L \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (\<phi>L \<phi>)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (prove)
using this:
  prv (\<phi>L \<phi>)
  prv (\<phi>L \<phi>) \<Longrightarrow> prv \<phi>

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. prv \<phi>

proof (state)
this:
  prv \<phi>

goal:
No subgoals!

text \<open>We could have of course inferred $\mathit{goedel\_first\_theEasyHalf\_pos}$
and $\mathit{goedel\_second}$ from these more general versions, but we leave the original
arguments as they are more instructive.\<close>
